scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Colin
scrape.text: a brutal and twisted tale. it's one of those books you can read in the course of a day mainly because you can't put it down. as one review put it, by the time you're halfway through the book you've been taken to a place you never thought you would've consented to go in the first place. after this and cruddy, i need to read some mitch albom or something. sheesh.
